title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

Brew your favorites fast in a space-saving design. The Keurig K-Compact delivers rich, delicious coffee in under a minute, with simple button controls and a slim 8-inch width that fits easily on crowded counters.

Key features:
- Brew sizes: Choose 6, 8, or 10 oz to match your mug or taste.
- Fast brewing: Enjoy coffee, tea, cocoa, or hot water in under a minute.
- 36 oz removable water reservoir: Fewer refills and easy cleaning.
- Smart Start: Heats and then automatically brews when ready—no extra steps.
- Simple button controls: Intuitive, no-fuss operation.
- Energy efficient: Auto-off turns the brewer off after 2 hours to save energy.
- Removable drip tray: Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and can hold a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.
- Hot water on demand: Dispense hot water for instant soups, oatmeal, and more.
- Compact footprint: Just 8 inches wide to fit small kitchens, dorms, and offices.
- Compatibility: Works with all Keurig K-Cup pods. Note: My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter compatibility may vary by model; check your unit’s specific compatibility.
- Packaging: Packaging may vary.

What’s in the box:
- Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker (Black)
- Removable 36 oz water reservoir
- Removable drip tray

Perfect for:
- Quick morning routines and on-the-go lifestyles
- Small spaces that need big convenience
- Households with varied taste preferences thanks to wide K-Cup pod variety

Enjoy Keurig convenience, speed, and variety in a sleek, compact brewer designed to fit your life.
